abstract: Detailed study of Internet censorship in China and Iran shows that blocking techniques are changing rapidly and are becoming significant obstacles for news organizations, governments and businesses.
snippet: A detailed examination of Web filtering and blocking in Iran and China offers information on how to combat the techniques.
lead_paragraph: A detailed examination of Web filtering and blocking in Iran and China offers information on how to combat the techniques.

headline.main: Internet Censorship Growth Hampers News, Study Says
headline.print_headline: Internet Censorship Growth Hampers News, Study Says
headline.seo: Battling Internet Censorship Must Evolve, Study Says
